name: DeleteBlogPost
description:
Delete a blog post by its unique ID.

Use this tool to delete a blog post using its ID. Note that this action permanently removes the post, unlike the in-app archive function. For dashboard archiving, use an update with `archivedInDashboard` set to `true`.

parameters.name: blog_post_ids_to_delete
parameters.description: An array of blog post IDs to delete. Each ID should be a string representing a unique blog post.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
